name: Multi Move
description: Determine one or more NPCs that will move towards another NPC.

npc_name.description: The name of the target NPC.

npc_distance.description: The distance from the target NPC.

target_npc_id.description: The ID of the target NPC.

source_npc_ids.description: An array containing the IDs of one or more NPCs that will be moving towards the target.

prompt: `{key}` if requested to move or follow
llm_feedback: {llm_output_source_names} are about to move towards {llm_output_target_name} at {playerName}'s request. {llm_output_source_names} will complete this action to the best of their ability and find a rationalization for the action if needed.
veto_warning: {llm_output_source_names} are about to move towards {llm_output_target_name} at {playerName}'s request. Begin your response with <veto> if any NPC would refuse to do so then explain in first person in character why.
